All existing characters are listed in the dropdown

items.description: Custom dropdown has proper UX behavior
steps_to_verify: Clicking outside the dropdown closes it
Dropdown is keyboard accessible (can open with Enter/Space, navigate with arrow keys)

items.description: Edit button next to dropdown opens rename modal for current character. Use the frontend-design skill to style the icon button.
steps_to_verify: A pencil/edit icon button appears next to the character dropdown
Clicking edit button opens a modal to rename the current character
Submitting new name updates the character name throughout the app
Edit button is only visible/enabled when a character is selected

Clicking delete button opens a confirmation modal
Confirming deletion removes the character from the app
After deletion, another character is auto-selected (or empty state shown)
